error_details.explanation: Incorrect final answer. An intermediate value 'phoebe_age_in_five_years' (value: 10.0) was reported instead of 'jacob_current_age' (value: 3.0).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 10
If Rehana is currently 25 years old, she will be 25+5=<<25+5=30>>30 in five years.
Rehana will be three times as old as Phoebe in five years, meaning Phoebe will be 30/3=10 years old in five years.
